body: I think I can remove the first copy by storing an `at::Tensor` rather than a raw buffer. As for 2 and 3, not sure I can get rid of those, since afaict `py::bytes` requires a copy. To clarify, is #3 in python?
body_html: I think I can remove the first copy by storing an at::Tensor rather than a raw buffer. As for 2 and 3, not sure I can get rid of those, since afaict py::bytes requires a copy. To clarify, is #3 in python?
